para.text: ABRA shall provide a licensee with either an investigative report or a public police incident report that may result in a show cause hearing as set forth in § 25-447 within 90 days of the date upon which the incident occurred.
The requirement in subsection (a) of this section shall not apply where:
Criminal action is being considered against the licensee or its employees; or
Enforcement action is requested by the Chief of Police under § 25-827.

annotations.annotation: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 added a colon at the end of the introductory language of (b).
